pullRequest.title: Support Advanced/Remote searches in Selection Session
pullRequest.bodyText:
#688
Checklist

 the [contributor license agreement][] is signed
 commit message follows [commit guidelines][]
 tests are included
 screenshots are included showing significant UI changes
 documentation is changed or added

Description of change
This PR addresses the issue that Remote search page and Advanced search page didn't display properly in Selection Session if they are open from new search UI.
There are three changes:


Create a new TS component named 'OeqLink'. The reason is we have a few places where we need to switch between React Route Link and MUI Link, depending on whether the page is in Selection Session.


For Advanced search requests coming from new search UI in Selection Session, create a new Legacy endpoint which is advanced/searching.do. To support this endpoint, also create a Section module and a Section.


Make sure functions related to Drag and Drop are only called when Selection Session is in structured.

commit.message:
Add a new Link component which provides either a MUI Link
or a React Router Link.

Use component OeqLink for accessing Remote search and
Advanced search.

Only prepare draggables when Selection Session
is in 'structured'.

Support using Advanced searches with new Search UI in Selection
Session.

This includes adding a new Section module and a Section which
serve 'advanced/searching.do'.

commit.message: A couple comment rewording for RootAdvancedSearchSection.

Centralise the building of URLs used in Selection Session
into a function to reduce duplicated code.

This also includes using the 'URL' class to avoid string
interpolation. In addition, add functions to access 'baseUrl'
provided by 'AppConfig'. This is primarily because 'baseUrl'
is an empty string in Jest tests, which result in errors
when using 'URL' class.
Make sure the selection submit URL is correct.
